banner_1.title: Indulge in Our Signature Dishes
banner_1.subTitle: Experience Culinary Excellence
banner_1.description: From sizzling steaks to mouthwatering pastas, our culinary experts craft dishes that tantalize your taste buds. Explore a world of exquisite flavors with every delightful bite

banner_2.title: Relaxing Atmosphere
banner_2.subTitle: Unwind in Style
banner_2.description: Escape the hustle and bustle and immerse yourself in our inviting ambiance. Whether it's a romantic dinner or a casual catch-up with friends, our restaurant provides the perfect setting.

banner_3.title: Host Your Next Event With Us
banner_3.subTitle: Special Events, Memorable Moments
banner_3.description: Celebrate birthdays, anniversaries, and more in style with our customizable event packages. Our dedicated team ensures every detail is perfect, leaving you free to enjoy the moment.
